findings.description: Replan memory session log omits categories=task_tags parameter that the existing _inject_memories log includes. Minor observability inconsistency.
findings.suggested_fix: Add categories=task_tags to the session_logger.log call for consistency

findings.description: Tag extraction logic (task.type + jira_project) is duplicated between _inject_memories and _request_replan. Could be extracted to a helper method.
findings.suggested_fix: Extract a _build_task_tags(task) helper. Non-blocking since the duplication is minimal (6 lines).

recommendation: Merge to main. Both suggestions are non-blocking improvements that can be addressed in a follow-up.
review_summary: Memory â†” Replanning integration is correctly implemented. format_for_replan() applies 2x priority boost to conventions/test_commands/repo_structure categories, respects 1500 char limit, and integrates cleanly into the _request_replan() prompt. 830/830 tests pass. Pylint 10/10. No security issues introduced.
